TopicTitle: CFG Editing: Deep Space Network Power

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I am currently running a 10x scale career in a system with OPM scale distances involved. I figured out how to edit the  power of individual antenna parts to increase their effective range - is there any way to do the same for the KSP deep space network? Currently, the stock highest level antennas (100G base) with a level 3 DSN can't reliably communicate between the equivalent of Kerbin and Duna (Gael and Tellumo - I am using GPP). 

Can I find and edit a cfg file for the deep space network?

Thanks,

Max
